title: Melissa & Doug Let’s Explore Sailboat Play Set
features: Explore pretend play boating adventures with this sturdy tent-fabric sailboat play set.Ideal for ages:3 years and up
Includes foam rudder, foam anchor that attaches to side of the boat, and collectible medallion
Easy to assemble; extra-sturdy floor, sides, and sail material stands up to countless hours of play; pieces store in tote
Roomy enough for multiple kids to play (38”H [with sail] x 23”W x 36”L assembled); styles and colors may vary
Makes a great gift for 3- to 6-year-olds, for hands-on, screen-free play
description: Let imaginations set sail and explore pretend play boating adventures anywhere, anytime with this easy-to-assemble sturdy tent-fabric sailboat! The play set includes a foam rudder and anchor, a removable, reusable sign to name the vessel, and a collectible Let’s Explore™ medallion. Special features include extra-sturdy material for the floor, sides, and sail, and realistic, detailed artwork. There’s plenty of room for multiple kids to play: Assembled boat is approximately three feet high, three feet long, and two feet wide. Pieces store in a handy take-along storage tote. Boat does not float; do not use in water. Let’s Explore™ encourages kids to connect with the natural world through imaginative play! Discover the joy of outdoor adventures that instill curiosity and confidence while inspiring kids to say, “Let’s Explore™”!
